title: AI can write your college essay, but it won't sound like you
description: Students who plan to use ChatGPT to write their college admissions essays should think twice: Artificial intelligence tools write highly generic personal narratives, even when prompted to write from the perspective of someone with a certain race or gender.

title: Microsoft blocks Israeli military’s use of AI and cloud over Palestinian surveillance
description: Microsoft has blocked the Israeli military and intelligence agencies from accessing its Azure cloud and artificial intelligence platforms due to their role in mass surveillance of Palestinians. Read here
content:
Microsoft has blocked access to parts of its cloud and AI services for Israel’s Unit 8200, following reports that the elite cyber-intelligence division used the technology to carry out mass surveillance of Palestinians.
